scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Creditworthiness Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible creditworthiness prediction model through a model inversion attack.  The attacker iteratively feeds crafted inputs to the model and analyzes the outputs to infer protected attributes like income or address.
initial_goal: Develop a method to infer sensitive customer attributes (income, address) from the publicly available creditworthiness prediction API.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A credit scoring API is exposed to external developers without sufficient rate limiting or input validation.  The attacker targets this API to reconstruct customer data.
